Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city building code, in relation to bird friendly materials
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city plumbing code in relation to bringing such code up to date with the 2015 edition of the international plumbing code with differences that reflect the unique character of the city and repealing chapter 11 and appendices C, F, and G of the New York city plumbing code in relation thereto.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Bringing New York Plumbing code up to date with the 2015 edition of the international plumbing code with differences that reflect the unique character of the city and repealing chapter 11 and appendices C, F, and G.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city plumbing code in relation to bringing such code up to date with the 2015 edition of the international plumbing code with differences that reflect the unique character of the city and repealing chapter 11 and appendices C, F, and G of the New York city plumbing code in relation thereto.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
